newsitem.title: UK: OPEC basket price eases to $19.52 on Monday.
newsitem.headline: OPEC basket price eases to $19.52 on Monday.

text.p: The price of OPEC's basket of seven crudes eased slightly to $19.52 a barrel on Monday from $19.54 on Friday, the OPEC news agency said, quoting the OPEC Secretariat.
The basket comprises Algeria's Saharan Blend, Indonesia's Minas, Nigeria's Bonny Light, Saudi Arabia's Arabian Light, Dubai of the UAE, Venezuela's Tia Juana and Mexico's Isthmus.
